website_summaries.verdict: Collapsible storage option that comes in 7 colors and is ideal for up to 370 pounds of storage.
pros: Versatile design lets it blend into the room or become an accent piece
Lid is sturdy enough to be a coffee table, footrest, and seat
Faux suede, padding, and top stitching combine well to provide an elegant look to an otherwise budget-friendly piece
cons: Not the strongest construction due to its collapsible design, and some reports of overly fragile lid that breaks after light use

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. I bought two in order to create a window seating area in my living room. Great quality and appearance for the price, very sturdy despite foldable design. I also love that you get deeper storage with these because the bench runs all the way to the ground instead of a shallower storage with legs like some other ones I saw on amazon. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Castleman

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high bed and was looking for something that my dogs could use as a step to get on my bed. Dog stairs are big and clunky so I thought an ottomon would be the trick. I found this one after looking at dozens. Since it was inexpensive, I thought I was use it temporarily while I looked for a more substantial one. However, no need. This one is perfect. My dogs use it as a step to the bed and I use it to sit on while I put my shoes and socks on. As a plus, I now have more storage!
customer_reviews.author: Edi R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Would have love to give it a 5 star but the quality could be a bit better. I’m only referring to the fact the fabric loosens up after resting your foot or anything else on it, as portrayed. Stores a good amount of things and very simple to assemble, just open box, unfold and place lid.
customer_reviews.author: Yomny

customer_reviews.title: This is ONLY for storage!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to give this a negative review based on the fact that it clearly says in the description that this is a foot rest. This is NOT strong enough to rest your feet on and god forbid you sit on it. This thing is almost exclusively for storage if someone saw it and accidentally went to sit or stand on it, it would be toast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medium and small bins
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I am loving it. It's very spacey. I threw a couple of 18 x 18 pillows to give you perspective of the size. I bought this to store some blankets and pillows. I'm 130 and am able to sit on it. I wouldn't suggest having two ppl sit on it- just to be on the safe side. I also purchased the small one as a footrest for the hubby. We'll see how it holds up as a footrest.
customer_reviews.author: Vixter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman! It is sturdy and the color compliments my couch perfectly. Perfect for me to use as a footstool as well. Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Color me impressed. I was expecting something cheap, frankly. But boy, was I wrong. This bench is just what my daughter needed in her room. She can easily access her things, and the bench is perfect for me to sit on while reading her bedtime stories. We love it so much we ordered a 2nd for our room. Added bonus, the 4 lb. dog can use it to jump up on our raised bed. 10 out of 10, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: I love this Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ottoman! The color is beautiful, it seems sturdy enough, and was super easy to assemble! Also GREAT size! I wanted something I could put my sons' toys in that was nice looking and wouldn't be an obvious "toy box"- let me tell you, it can fit a LOT of toys! I am considering buying another in a different color! Thanks for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cool
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, not as sturdy as the description may lead you to believe. Not holding up too great with the abuse a two year old can dole out. Would probably be ok in a corner somewhere just to look nice but caution is you plan on using it a lot for sitting/propping up feet/letting your kid climb all over it. Consider ordering the shorter versions - I bought both and the shorter ones seem a lot sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A storage box that looks like an expensive piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium storage box and I was a bit skeptical as to its quality but when it arrived I was really impressed. The medium is 30 x 15 x 15, and it's surprisingly sturdy. It folds out easily, and has a velvet type surface that is really, really nice. It's so nice that this storage box ends up looking like an expensive piece of furniture (and I'm not joking). I like this so much, I'm going to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Folantin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what my daughter was looking for! She was trying to replace a well used, similar type product. She needed the same size and preferably same color as what she had. I saw this one and took a chance. It is sturdy, perfect size, and color was a bit deeper than her previous one, but an even better match for her room. Time will tell if this one holds up as long as her other one, construction seems to be much better. Seller is great, can recommend both seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: It seems quite sturdy. My 5 year old and 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an attractive yet inexpensive storage solution for all the little toys my 3 young kids leave downstairs. This fit the bill perfectly! It came folded but was a breeze to put together. The box is a bit heavy so my husband lifted it into the house from the doorstep. It seems quite sturdy. My 5 year old and 2 year old have stood on it at the same time ( it's their pretend stage now haha) and it held up!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cat proof!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great footrest for my office desk, I store a fluffy throw blanket in it for easy access. It's a velvety faux-suede and my cats DO NOT scratch it up like typical fabric furniture. It's pretty solid considering it's materials, a small person could definitely sit or even stand on it. It's so nice, I bought another one for my husband's desk!
customer_reviews.author: Kittylover

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as described.
customer_reviews.text: Seller redirected mail sent tp Amazon and said-Amazon fulfilled this purchase and to contact them? I used this as a step stool to get onto my lofted dorm bed for one month before the lid collapsed in. The description said it would hold up to 200lbs, and as a 100lb girl, I am very disappointed in its sturdiness. If you are not planning on using this as seating or a step stool, it is a very cute piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: This will only last for about 3 months. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy and fit what I need so I purchased. The first warning sign is that about 2 weeks after purchase, with normal storage (Blankets, soft teddy bears) it appeared to be shifting, like the sides were not holding on their own. I took out some of the blankets to compensate. Well after about a month of taking the lid on and off, (propped it against the couch during) the top snapped in the middle because it is not made of wood, more like a heavy duty cardboard. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bre A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and very sturdy. Looks pretty luxurious also. As for weight, I can tell you I'm 6ft tall and weigh 255lbs and I've sat on this several times for 20+ minutes and it was like I was a feather. Nice amount of interior storage and very easy to put up. Took about 30 seconds to unfold it. My only issue would be the smell. It's got an odd wood/chemical sort of smell inside. It's not strong nor can you smell it when the box is closed, but it's there. I put a cedar closet bar in it and sealed it up for 3 days. Just smells like cedar now.
customer_reviews.author: Republic84

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my office
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the whole "fold-able" aspect because it makes ottomans sound cheap when they have that feature but I was pleasantly surprised. The top is durable and slightly squishy, which is what I wanted. The sides of the base seem durable. It's the perfect storage size for a blanket/throw. And I can pack up the whole thing easily when I want the floor space. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large storage ottoman and I have nothing but great things to say about this product! I love the material! I love the size! I love have sturdy it is! Yet so easy to take apart! It has help two grown men at the same time for about 2 hours one weighing 210 pounds and another 140! I was totally shocked!!! I use it to store my decorative pillows from my bed and they fit perfectly! The only thing I don’t really like about this product is the smell of wood it has!!! But it’s still not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top is plush and soft and the ottoman is much larger than I anticipated (in a good way). The color in the photos are a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived and was exactly as described. The top is plush and soft and the ottoman is much larger than I anticipated (in a good way). The color in the photos are a little off, but this is a perfect addition to my son's room, as it easily holds every book he owns. Comes with a velcro divider for the inside. Would purchase again, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee Day

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Smells Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing smells horrible!!! I have tried to air it out but it still smells bad and everything I put in it smells bad now. It's so intolerable I can't even keep it in the room with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stowing blankets
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for - we've been wanting a place to conveniently stow blankets, and this little ottoman is perfect. Our living room furniture is grey micro-suede, and the grey color is almost a perfect match. It looks nice too, you'd never know it was collapsible. It shipped flat and took seconds to put together. My only complaint is there is a weird smell on the inside - it reminds me of hay. It does make the blankets smell like it for a few minutes before it dissipates. I've been meaning to try some sort of fabric refresher/odor absorber to see if it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenette

customer_reviews.title: Supports a good amount of weight
customer_reviews.text: When first opened, there was a strong odor coming from the interior storage once unfolded. Nothing disgusting though. I needed to air it out for a week or two. Looks and feels great. Quality build! Easy to set up or store away. Great volume, holds fairly a lot of items. I use it as storage for some of my entertainment items. Supports a good amount of weight. I would say nothing more than maybe 250...? I don't recommend using it as a stool. Sitting on it mainly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I love this ottoman / storage container. Now only four stars because it's not as sturdy as they claim it to be. I use it for school storage and projects. But I would most definitely not recommend anybody sitting on them. But I was able to get everything in there that I needed to with room to spare. I would definitely recommend this. And I will buy more in the future. But again I wouldn't sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmermaid85

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage and functional seating at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a blanket chest for her room that was stylish and functional and in her budget. This fit all 3 categories. She easily stores her extra blankets, school supplies and other odds and ends. It serves as seating when she has friends over and it is sturdy enough to not worry if it will be ruined. She isn’t using the included divider but it is a great option. Best of all...it unfolds and is ready to use in less than 1 minute. This is the 3rd one in our house and would recommend this to anyone in need of this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice storage ottoman for blankets in our living room and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice storage ottoman for blankets in our living room and it looks nice. The top is hard to align to the bottom, which causes issues when people try to sit on it. It's not super sturdy, so don't plan on this to be a bench. My 4 year olds have already fallen through because the top was no on all the way. Quality is okay, but it works for storing blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: nice but stinky
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman storage is sooooo easy to put together, there really is no assembly. It looks nice and hold a lot depending on what you want to store in it. It is not sturdy enough to sit on, I put mine in a corner for extra storage only. The biggest reason for the 3 stars is the smell. There is a very strong chemical smell, so if you're storing blankets, beware that they might stink too. I tried some Febreeze on the inside, seemed to help a little.
customer_reviews.author: clgdpt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This came packaged well was easy to setup because it just pops up which made me skeptical about it being sit on but it’s very sturdy and me and my husband both Tried it but at the same time I even bounced up and down a little to see if it would bend but it didn’t I bought this to hide my boys toys when we have guests rather then having a toy chest in my living room I opted for this instead so I’m pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie b.

customer_reviews.title: Furniture and storage for such a low price? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing invention ever! Not only has this added extra furniture to my kids' rooms, but there's no excuse for them to have messy rooms anymore! This doubles as a toy box or storage. I haven't tried sitting on it yet but both of my kids have stood and sat on theirs and I see no signs of wear or sinking in whatsoever. And the best part--- it costs so much less than furniture or even a toy box! Highly recommend! I purchased both the large and medium benches. Would certainly purchase again for other needs in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Caasi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a storage bench for a few months - but the price compared to the look was never great. I finally decided to just buy this, thinking it would suffice until I found something better...but this one is GREAT! Super sturdy, fits a lot more than expected, and virtually no assembly. And you can't beat the price. Looks great, maybe not something I'd put in a nice living room, but anywhere else just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favour and get this ottoman! It’s perfect and the price makes it even more perfect. It’s sturdy (my fiancé and I both sat on it -350lbs total and it didn’t even falter) has so much space which we’re using for our daughters toys. We got the black and it looks so expensive and sleek. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Very strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This works fine to store the extra bedsheets, but I wouldn’t put anything heavy on top. My main issue is the chemical smell. I had to air it out for several weeks before I could stand having it in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the horrific SMELL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sent the first bench back because of the horrible chemical smell. I tried baking soda, Lysol spray, heavy duty carpet cleaner and it masked the odor temporarily (like hours, maybe) but the odor was back in full effect and has made the blankets I laid on top of it smell terrible as well. I made the mistake of having them send me a replacement thinking it was just a fluke. And the second bench has the same smell. I see a few others had this same issue, but since the ratings were so high I figured I just had a dud... nope, two for two were awful. This one will go back too.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G.

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: love this suede-like covering! so much better than the slick vinyl where everything slides off including my feet. is sturdy enough, lid fits well, easy to assemble, nice padding on top. it is holding up well after months of daily use but will buy this same one again if it ever wears out. amazon warehouse rocks!
customer_reviews.author: bonanaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, needs handles
customer_reviews.text: The teal color is great, it was super easy to put together and has come in such good use now that we have a newborn at home. The size makes it an easy ottoman for my feet but also a makeshift baby station of items I need at my fingertips. I removed a star simply because it’s not easy to move one-handed. It doesn’t slide on carpet easily, so it would be really nice if it hand handles on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: MrsYeti

customer_reviews.title: Loved look but smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look. Storage was nice. I took the lid off after a couple of days to get a blanket out and the smell is unbearable. It is a chemical type smell. All my blankets have to be re washed to hopefully get the smell out. I hate that this is the case because I love the look. Whatever it is made out of is VERY stinky inside the ottoman :( I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much, I bought another ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a storage bench from this seller. I'm happy with the lightweight construction that is easy for me to set up straight out of the box - just unfold and place the lid on top. The padded lid makes a great seat when it's not covered by cats, who appreciate the bench as much as I do! This second bench was in the large size, and it holds bookoodles of toys and books for my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: LAMSHOP

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a convenient storage in the bedroom, as it's a nice shade of teal that matches our sheets. It has plenty of storage room and it was extremely easy to setup. Feels sturdy, but the panels are relatively thin around the sides so I question it... but there again I'm a pretty skeptical guy. It works perfectly for what we bought it for, and I even thought of getting a couple others of different colors to match the various bed sets we have because they're so easy to setup and take down. They really don't take up much room, if any really, when they're folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Aurigauh

customer_reviews.title: Things that are convenient bring joy.
customer_reviews.text: It fits all my beach towels in it plus room for more. I have a pool & anyone can grab a towel before they go out. Also my grandkids climb on it but that also makes me hope it stands up to their climbing & sitting on it. My cousin has the two medium sized ones & she’s had them for awhile. She lives on a lake so I got her idea of the towels. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Ottomans
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first 2 I bought, that I bought a 3rd. They fit in perfectly with my living room furniture, hold throws, extra decorative pillows, etc and you can put your feet up on them and relax. They are sturdy and solid. I love em. Even better if you don't need them, they fold up nice and small and you can easily put them in a closet for later use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: First off I bought 2 as I was in need of storage, and I am not disappointed. They were extremely easy to set up, the one for my child's room, fit all her toys and still has some room left. The living room one was able to fit all my crocheting and extra candles and such. These have a divider in them so you can separate things. Lastly I was worried with as easy as they were to set up that they wouldnt make a good bench.... I was wrong. Both my daughter and i sat on it together and it held our weight and didnt wobble. Her and I combined weigh about 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: jenisen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice storage bench
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this to be able to store my 2 yr old grandson's toys in, rather than keeping them on shelves in my guest bedroom. I was pleasantly surprised by #1, how roomy it is, and #2 how sturdy it seems. Of course we'll see what happens when he gets here and attempts to climb on it, but I sat on it, and it was sturdy enough for that. If it came in the right colors, I would buy one for my living room for blankets and to put our feet on in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: RavenHarte

customer_reviews.title: Attractive storage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a handy place to store pillows and blankets for when the grandchildren had slumber parties, and this met my needs perfectly while also being good looking. I ordered two large, grey units to place end to end under the window in my bedroom. I don't feel they are strong enough for seating, but that is not a priority for me, and they look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bacon

customer_reviews.title: I like my cube!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store things in that was making my night table look junky and to rest my foot on while I’m sitting on my bed watching tv. I notice that it is breaking down on that corner but I’m going to do something, I haven’t come up with an idea yet, to reinforce the corners. I love the color, I chose purple.
customer_reviews.author: Mell Mell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. We were searching for an ottoman, but they were just too expensive and we didn’t like the variety! I was searching through amazon and came across this product and it seemed like the perfect match! The only flaw would be the sturdiness of the bench. It’s not horrible but if we put a few more dividers inside the bench, it will be fine. Overall, I’m glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black velvet finish in the med size and i loved it so much i bought another! Durable to use for my childrens toy boxes for the ends of their beds. They climb on them and sit on them and they still hold up. Easy to put together. I mean youre really just popping it out and putting the flat insert into it. This is one of the best products ive gotten off amazon and i am 100% satisfied. I even had a few of my friends order some for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Mahal209

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing toys
customer_reviews.text: It has helped us have a place to store the endless amounts of baby dolls our 4 year old has. She also likes to sit on it and pretend to be the teacher to her babies. I have also sat on it and felt safe, and I weigh way more than she does. For a collapsible bench, it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Randall

customer_reviews.title: This Storage Ottoman Bench is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly amazed to discover that no tools were needed to assemble the bench. It truly did fold open. It is sturdy and beautiful. Exceedingly pleased with this purchase and high;y recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Color is as shown. Comes folded flat and assembles in literally seconds. With the divider inside it feels very sturdy to sit on (and I'm 200+ lbs). I haven't tried sitting on it without the divider in the middle. The cushion is firm but pretty comfortable. I love that it's dual purpose (storage and seating) because my space is so small. I added some accent pillows since your back will be against the wall. Now it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: cookido

customer_reviews.title: cute but lid is near impossible to put back on once removed
customer_reviews.text: We loved this item initially. Put it at the end of my daughters bed for her dolls and barbies. Love the middle divider to keep things organized. However, the lid is impossible for my 7 yr old to put on and a huge pain in the but for myself. I am trying to figure out what to store in here to limit needing to remove the lid. Not the best design just looks cute, just dont plan on needing to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: bhthompson5

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the quality of this storage ottoman. Looks nice and seems sturdy. I actually have ordered another one. I just got a new bed which is higher and my dogs are unable to jump up on this one so I am putting the ottomans next to the bed to give them a "step up". One dog uses the stairs I have but the other one won't, so I am hoping this solves the problem for him. Also nice for blanket storage.
customer_reviews.author: C Burns

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get past the smell
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this so much. It’s a beautiful color and made so well. Lots of storage. But the smell.... I can’t get past it. Been in the garage airing out for weeks and now on the front porch. The chemical smell won’t go away. I’m praying the smell goes away soon. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2bb10

customer_reviews.title: it seem quite sturdy, the panels are made of wood then covered ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this storage bench. 1 star for quality; it seem quite sturdy, the panels are made of wood then covered with suede fabric 1 star for the reasonable price 1 star for color (teal) being true to the picture/description 1 star for quick processing and delivery time 1 star for how easy it is to assemble
customer_reviews.author: CongaRue

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at the quality and sturdiness! It made my entry way so much neater and now there is a place to sit and put on and take off shoes. It is very sturdy and beautiful (I bought the teal). I weight about 165 lbs and my daughter is around 360 lbs and we both use it as a bench. I highly recommend it! It would also make a great bench/storage chest in front of couch or at the end of a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one! If you’re on the fence, please don’t hesitate just get it. They are perfect for storing handbags, blankets, toys, etc... I have one in each our bedrooms because they look stunning with our decor. Not to mention the color options. My 5 year old loves jumping off them and none has lost their shape. Will purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal

customer_reviews.title: How sturdy the item was
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is beautiful to look at and very useful. I can clear side tables from unsightly clutter. It is remarkably sturdy as extras seating and the price of this item is quite remarkable. I am looking around my home to see if I could fit in another storage bench.
customer_reviews.author: sew2015

customer_reviews.title: Great qualitly.
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first. Used it in front of my couch. Eventually the lid wore out at the corners. It would have lasted much longer if my kids eerent so hard on things. The bottom part held up nice and turned into a toybox for the kids stuffed animals. I would still highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's just not at all sturdy. It looks nice, it is certainly easy enough to pop open, but it's just not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this bench for storage in a bedroom! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! I bought the black one for my sons room (for all of his Nerf guns!) and the purple one for my daughters room! Very sturdy, easy to set up and even has a removable divider. Three of us can easily sit on it and it holds our weight. Very nicely constructed as well. I have placed these at the foot of the bed and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: great storage for couch throws
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it was the exact size dimentions I was looking for (15x15x15). My plan was to use in my livingroom for storing the many throws I use. I can fit 4 throws nicely folded in this storage ottman. I will also use it for an extra sitting option, which is perfect near a coffee table. It is very well made and quite study. I am extremely happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one the kid breaks at the corners and the body part of the box is collapsible, the buttons on the lid are poorly on. My kid is almost about to break and it’s only been a month and 11 days, for the price is it made poorly and it worth it. I wanted this for blanket storage I can fit 3 of the kohl’s big blankets in it comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Heather (elevated_vibes13)

customer_reviews.title: I love this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. I didn't think it would be very sturdy because its foldable. But i have sat on it several times and its wonderful, you would never know. I got this to go with my futon. When its closed i keep the linen and pillows in the ottoman and use it to put my feet up. When i want to open the futon the ottoman easily slides right over. Great buy. Comfy foot rest. Lots of storage space. Sturdy enough to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: KittyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Both are really nice , sturdy and useful.  NO more plastic.
customer_reviews.text: These storage boxes are really nice! I have nothing bad to say about them. They look nice and hold a lot of stuff. It's so much better than those plastic bins. They look great and are very useful. I've ordered more of them in the black pleather.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMoosieandWillowsmom

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up. Does not look like a foldable ottoman once put together and is very sturdy. My only complaint is it had a strong chemical smell that transferred to the contents inside. I sprayed it with Febreeze yesterday which I’m hoping will help.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Listen, this little storage box isn't going to save the world. But it will hold a good amount of stuff and it will look cute wherever you put it. The dimensions are exactly as advertised, the color is true to what you see on the website, and it's doing good work in the bedroom where I placed it. My daughter sits on it without it falling apart, it holds the stuff I need it to, and it's doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: AllyPak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The bin is nice looking and stores a lot of stuff. I have been using it as a toy box for my little one since I bought it many months ago and it is still in very good condition. It is easy to clean and the color hasn’t faded. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amu28

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I’m so happy with this purchase. I am making a simple guest bedroom at my house and I didn’t wanted to spend a lot of money but I wanted to look nice and hold some storage because we don’t have a dresser yet. I simply love how it looks like! It doesn’t look cheap and it’s charming. I love the blue color. It’s super easy to set up and light. I don’t know if it holds weigh and I really don’t care since no one will be sitting on it. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Inae Dias

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price, first one the button broke off the top first day had to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment, great product
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for storage ottomans at multiple stores and when I ran across these on Amazon I figured I would give them a try especially for the price. The assembly was super easy and so far I love the product. I do know that it can hold 230 lbs. with no problem and continue to be sturdy and not feel as if it was going to break. I have been very pleased with the product so far and plan to order a couple more in various sizes for other rooms in my home. Well worth the money and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: A lot of storage, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had feet! It is a little low to the ground. But hold a ton, is easy to set up, holds up well if you sit on it, and the cats don't use it as a scratching post. It is a "soft" red....with pinkish overtones. So buy accordingly. These are great storage options however and come in a variety of colors and finishes.
customer_reviews.author: LALLAW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about how good the quality here would actually be based on the price, but I was very happily surprised. It’s beautiful, well made, and much sturdier than I expected. I thought no way it’s trying enough to sit on if I can also fold it down! But it is =) It has a lot of space, and the outside is beautiful!! Love it, would absolutely buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: jstans

customer_reviews.title: Bench solved a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Sturdy and strong... the kids use it to sit on while playing video games on the Xbox or watching movies. We store board games, DVDs and video games inside the bench. One drawback, I don't like the buttons on top and the material stains easily so I cover the bench to keep it clean. The corners also tear easily when pushed around to different areas of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking But Smells Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bench would be perfect at the foot of my bed. It looks nice but has a terrible odor that gives me a headache. I thought the smell would disappear after a week but it is as strong as ever. I think it might be all the flame retardant chemicals. I have to get rid of it. It's made my entire bedroom stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the xxl sized ottoman. Do not let the small box that it gets delivered in get you discouraged like I was! They were not kidding when they said fully collapsable! This thing is FANTASTIC! Very sturdy and beautiful. Easy to unfold and looks perfect in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: CaseyB

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son to store things in instead of a toybox or something like it. It smelled a bit like vinegar but this is great for the price. it is currently filled with numerous nerf guns. The teal color is just bright enough to look great while fitting with a boys room.
customer_reviews.author: Deena P.

customer_reviews.title: With time it difficult to put the lid on.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice. I needed it to store something that I wanted to have handy. The only thing is the longer had it the more difficult it is to get the lid on. I don’t ever over stuff it but the size of a bow out with time Which can make it difficult to put the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: chipmunk53

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite After Christmas Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is INCREDIBLE! I bought this for toy storage for my toddler. I wanted something spacious and something safe for my toddler's room. The bench part of this is great because it is soft and serves as a great place to sit or put other toys and stuff animals on. I actually liked this so much that I ordered one in purple for my daughter's room and one in grey for my room. I'm hoping those will be just as great. I actually ended up selling three people on these the night I used mine and raved about it on social media. Seriously a great purchase in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece, the fabric is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece, the fabric is beautiful ...it’s very well constructed. When I first opened it and saw that it folds together I was skeptical about how sturdy it would be, but once put together it can take well over my 170Ibs. Plus storing things like blankets inside is just great and it matches my furniture very well and looks 4 times more expensive than it is. I’ll be ordering a second one now , what a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jacob croymans

customer_reviews.title: The product is sturdy and nice looking, I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, actually I bought two. I plan to store sweaters and switch out seasonal clothes as the seasons change. There is no assembly just unfold and insert the bottom piece in the bottom to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer with an honest opinion 🌷

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color sturdy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and the top is extremely sturdy. Be sure to put that long rectangular heavy cardboard in the bottom that is often sort of hidden up in the lid and this cardboard piece will stabilize the storage portion
customer_reviews.author: Aclance

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STORAGE AND TOY CHEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I ordered this that it would not hold all my granddaughters toys (and there are alot). It held all of them and still has room. I also bought one for storage in my bedroom. Great. Very well constructed. The cardboard is very heavy duty. I'm going to order another one for my granddaughters house. Arrived on time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea J. Lazear

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I thought I was going to have to put it together then realized it only takes two minutes to do if that. Surprised it is very very sturdy and can store a lot. Would recommend this for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Zeppelin

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice storage chest
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice storage chest, very roomy. I don't know if I would sit on it, but a child could. I purchased for my granddaughter's room and she loved it. No hinges. This was a breeze to set up. The top is padded and material is very nice. It is a little pricey, but I didn't see much else out there like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchakat

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality, and really helps to organize toys.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price and is very sturdy. You wouldn’t believe how much can fit in it. Went to The Container store and got several bins that easily stack in it. We have been able to organize perfectly. Keeps a multitude of small items tidy and organized- and off the floor! A life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Love! Purchased more.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Can't say enough positive things. They are sturdy. Easy to assemble. Has a ton of storage. Plus they look so classy with a few pillows thrown on top. Warning, strong smell, can't get rid of it. But it doesn't bother me that much, smells like tea bags lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my bench
customer_reviews.text: For years I was putting two together to get the look and storage I needed as a bed bench. Width was always my issue. This is great and looks better than my makeshift bench. Now wheels...hint, hint
customer_reviews.author: NCSC

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this storage bench. The inside is very spacious. It holds all of my shoes and still has plenty of room. It’s very stylish and the teal color matches perfectly with my bedroom decor. Also, it’s very comfortable to sit on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but smelled bad
customer_reviews.text: Really love this, very sturdy and nice looking, the quality is great. Only complaint I had was it smelled really bad and I had to spray it down a lot, I’m still hoping the smell will eventually go away. It also made what I put inside it smell. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR TOYS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes to leave toys downstairs when they should be in her room. So we got the ottoman Bench so she could put her toys away downstairs and so there wouldnt be a huge toybox in the living room. It looks really nice with our other furniture and it is also very sturdy :). I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Very, very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time it was packaged very nice, I purchased this used because I was kinda nervous about it not matching my furniture, I is perfect! It looks brand spanking new, it's the perfect size for my living room I added some throw pillows I already had an flower vases an it made my space pop!! Very pleased. It's also very sturdy for sitting an spacious for storing things, will buy another if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Porchia T.

customer_reviews.title: This Velvety Piece of Greatness is the Therapy I’ve Always Needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve NEVER left a review for ANY product, but this right here, this formerly-known-as-the-artist-Prince-colored-velvety-faux-suede box of greatness deserved a review! First, I’m the antithesis of mechanically inclined and slapped this baby together in the amount of time it takes to salivate over fresh tacos. It’s perfectly sized, true to color and deep, it is deeeeeep. I can store blankets, document, posters, journals, shoes, deferred dreams, blocked contacts, ANYthing in here, former lovers (jk,jk). It was constructed by the gods to make my life better, and I’d just like to say, thanks y’all! Buy this if you want better for yourself. And ya know, if you’re not stupid. This deserves 72 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench for foot of bed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely surprised at the quality of this bench! It is very sturdy, and it looks great!! The center divide is perfect for keeping stored items sorted, and the lid is well-padded to use as a seat while putting on shoes. Definitely a good purchase! The teal color is truly beautiful, I'm so thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect multifunctional piece. I use this as an intermediate step for the dog to get on the bed, a place for the cat to nap, a place to sit to put on shoes, and storage for extra blankies. This storage bench looks very nice and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: logicat

customer_reviews.title: Love it💕
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom. After we redid her room, I just wanted something bright and Cheery. This fit the bill perfectly! It is a very pretty color, and it has more storage then I thought it would. I'm so happy with it! I'm going to order the two Ottomans for my mother just because.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a toy box. It's very sturdy and holds so much stuff. The lid isn't too heavy for my three and half year old to lift and move. The teal color is Rich and lovely. Great purchase for the price. I love that it doubles as a bench for her.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this storage ottoman for my daughter’s room to hold her toys. I am very impressed with the size, storage capacity, & sturdiness. Delivery was on time. I would definitely recommend to others & will even probably be buying the same one for my youngest as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Good size, not the most stable but it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size, not the most stable but it looks nice. I use this as storage for a vacuum in my upstairs loft so i dont have to bring it up and down. it doesnt hold the vacuum when it is assembled i have to disconnect the handle from the base but then it fits well. When you sit on it you can feel like wobble a little bit. could be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: I love this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman. It's the perfect size. Very easy to set up and take down one is moving. Light weight which makes it easy when needing to move it temporarily somewhere. The gray color is perfect as it is very complimentary to the other grays I'm using in the room I'm using it in. I love that it is a faux suede rather than leather as leather would not look right with the other furniture I have in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great for attractive storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We needed a place to store board games in our living room and this is perfect. I wouldn’t let my 240 pound husband lounge on it, but the kids are fine. It’s pretty and functional and doesn’t look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to make and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these benches, and the product is exactly what you'd expect. Firstly, there is no need building it with tools or anything all you have to do it just put the pieces together. So easy to make and convenient to use! And I'm especially thankful for the sellers' great service! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't stand on it but....
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for for the end of the bed. It's not too tall so that my dog can jump on it before jumping on the bed. You can sit on it, but I wouldn't stand on it. I use it to store winter/or summer clothes in between seasons.
customer_reviews.author: ToraZiyal

product_meta.title: Sorbus Storage Ottoman Bench – Collapsible/Folding Bench Chest with Cover – Perfect Toy and Shoe Chest, Hope Chest, Pouffe Ottoman, Seat, Foot Rest, – Contemporary Faux Suede (Purple)
feature_bullets: STORAGE OTTOMAN CUBE (FAUX SUEDE,PURPLE) — Add storage and seating with a beautiful cubed shaped folding ottoman — Tuck away clothing, linens, blankets, toys, and more to maximize your space with style and function
REDUCE CLUTTER— Effortlessly organize after a clean-up session— Conceal household objects with convenient storage compartment and lid cover
FOLDABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT — Quickly unfold for easy assembly or fold away when not in use— Transport from room to room with a lightweight, compact design

PERFECT FOR HOME , OFFICE, DORM — Great addition to any home, office, college dorm, studio, guest room, walk-in-closet, playroom, den, etc—Use as a hassock, foot stool, seat bench cushion, coffee table, storage chest, and more
SLEEK DESIGN — Stylish faux suede fabric (100% Polyester) — Cushioned padding — Meticulous button tufted lid details — Complements any décor — Measures approximately 15" L x 15" W x 15" H
